mutants.code:
import re

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.split('', string)
    reversed_words = words[::-1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

import re

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.split('\\s+', string)
    reversed_words = words[::+1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string

import re

def reverse_words(string):
    string = string.strip()
    words = re.split('\\s+', string)
    reversed_words = words[::--1]
    reversed_string = ' '.join(reversed_words)
    return reversed_string
